title: Private Island Luxury in Historic Bray with Traditional Afternoon Tea
description:
Just 30 minutes from London’s Heathrow Airport, the exclusive Bray in Berkshire is one of the hottest gastronomical spots in Britain, with two three-Michelin-star restaurants on the doorstep. Discover everything this charming historic village has to offer with a stay at the luxurious Monkey Island Estate, a grand Georgian-era hotel nestled on a private island on the River Thames with more than 800 years of history. Your quintessentially British escape includes daily breakfast, a traditional afternoon tea on one day of your stay and a welcome gift in your room on arrival.

⏱Buy now, book later: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
